start:
Hi! I'm a bot that can help you
collect
waifus or husbandos from various animes. To get started, type /help
help: There is a list of commands you can use: /start - Start the bot /help - Get a list of commands /language - Change the language used to display messages /collect - Collect a waifu/husbando /list - List all the waifus/husbandos you have collected /delete - Delete a waifu/husbando
language: Select the language you want to use to display messages:
language_set: The language has been set to {new_lang}
new_character:
A mysterious character appears...!

Reply to this message with the character's name to collect it.
has_character: You have already collected this character.
max_characters: You have reached the maximum number of characters you can collect.
not_a_character: This is not a valid character.
wrong_character: You missed the character's name. Try again.
expired_character: This character has expired and can no longer be collected.
